issue.title: Executing hx_connect() from standalone computer running MATLAB R2014b API causes MATLAB to crash

content.raw: I just discovered a workaround for this problem. Running MATLAB R2014b as an administrator eliminates the crashing problem when executing hx_connect(). I have no idea why this changes anything, but it does.
content.html: I just discovered a workaround for this problem. Running MATLAB R2014b as an administrator eliminates the crashing problem when executing hx_connect(). I have no idea why this changes anything, but it does.
